ygData.subject: RE: Equipment?
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is my stuff at 21st.  This may be a bit unfare, because on the Test server, nothing is ever camped, so I can get stuff easier than on a prod server. face
ygData.messageBody:
Here is my stuff at 21st. This may be a bit unfare, because on the
Test server, nothing is ever camped, so I can get stuff easier than on
a prod server.

face = grotesque mask +7dex -9chr (I bought for 30pp)
neck = blackened iron medallion (+3 wis/int)
ear = +3wisdom earring (enchanter)x2 (I paid 30pp apiece)
head = savant's cap (+3wis/int)
hands = ringmail gloves (nothing special here)
chest = dwarven tunic (+8 fire/cold/poison, I think)
wrist = ivory bracelet (+3 agility, +10 mana)
wrist = some other bracer, I think it's +20 mana, I'm not sure.
feet = banded boots
back = bronze cloak
legs = banded leggings
arms = banded arms
shoulder = lizardscale mantle (+3 wis)
wisdom = 141 (base 112)
weapons = enamelled black mace (some 45th level fighter just gave to
me!), screaming mace (I use it as a flashlight now.) :), 2hb = glowing
wooden crook, I convinced someone that a bloodforge hammer was better
and he traded me for it. He was a DE, and he couldn't get one any
other way, of course. The GWC has a better dmg ratio.

I'm trying to go to Upper guk to get gatorscale leggings. Think I
might try to go to Befallen and get barbed arms, too.

How much does the silver ruby veil cost? I wasn't familiar with this
item. I had heard of the platinum one (that is +7 wis), but that is
way too expensive for me.


Ergo Soulhealer
Test Server


>From: "Marquardt, Kris L." <Kris_Marquardt@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Equipment?
>Date: Thu, 18 Nov 1999 10:54:05 -0700
>
>Looking at that list I don't feel quite so bad. Here is mine at 18th level.
>
>Wrists = Bronze Bracers (x2)
>Arms = Barbed +2 dex
>Shoulders = Bronze
>Back = Leather Cloak
>Chest = Dwarven Ringmail Tunic +8 vs Heat, Cold & Magic
>Ears = +2 Agility Earings (x2)
>Face = Silver Ruby Veil +4wis +4 str
>Head = Bronze
>Fingers = +2 Wisdom Rings (x2)
>Hands = Raw Hide Gloves
>Feet = Scarab Boots
>Legs = Ringmail Legs
>Neck = Bronze
>Waist = cloth rope
>Primary Wpn = Shining Star of Light (1HB)
>Shield = Shiny Brass Shield
>Secondary Wpn =Bloodforge Hammer (2HB)
>
>Heisler, Cleric of Brell
>E'ci
>Armigers of Mirth
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Alvarez, Ruben (consultant) [mailto:ruben.alvarez@...]
>Sent: Thursday, November 18, 1999 10:45 AM
>To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Equipment?
>
>
>From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
>
>Well I am going to start with my equipment. I am level 27 almost had 28
>last night but died right before I was going to ding. I consider my stuff
>to be very low end compared to everyone else.
>
>Arm= Bronze bracer
>Arm= Ivory bracelet, gives some mana and something else
>Back= Lizzy cloak +5 dex
>Chest= Dwarven Ring mail tunic. its got a whole bunch of resist on it
>Ear= +2 agil earringsx2
>Face= I think its a iron mask. Its some standard armor
>Feet= Bronze boots
>Finger= +2 wisx2
>hands= snake skin gloves
>Legs= Banded armor
>Neck= Spiked collar
>Shoulder= I forget :P I think banded
>Waist= Cheap belt :P
>Primary weapon= Cold Iron Morning star
>Shield=Shiny brass shield
>
>
>I know what you people are saying that I should camp for items but that
>takes all the fun out of it. When you have to camp weeks to get 1 item.
>BAH!!!
>
>Qanin Skywanderer
>27th Cleric The Rathe
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Chris Riley [mailto:criley@...]
>Sent: Thursday, November 18, 1999 12:33 PM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Equipment?
>
>
>From: Chris Riley <criley@...>
>
> >Well, I consider myself to be under equipped for my level (getting harder
>to
> >say that now that I have some purple stuff) as I have had a few items for
> >almost 30 levels now. Anyway I'll give you a run down on the items I
>wear.
>
>
>How about posting a list of what you were wearing at the milestones (lvl
>10, lvl 20, etc) That way we could see what we should be looking for when
>we reach those levels.
>
><< text3.html >>
